description: The first patch to Chipped Blackstone with brand new support for datapacks!
changelog: Sticks no longer generate in mushroom biomes.
Slightly increased the stick block's hitbox size.
Players will now experience a 7-second cooldown after a successful foraging attempt to prevent abusing high-efficiency or modded tools(configurable).
Players will now experience a 1-second cooldown after an unsuccessful foraging attempt to prevent abusing high-efficiency tools (configurable).
Chunks now have a foraging limit of 10 forages per chunk to encourage exploration (configurable).
The foraging system now uses data to process foraging drops.
Massively overhauled the entire foraging backend system.
Developers can now modify a forage drop by using an event handler for BlockForagedEvent.
Added a custom leek death message.
